computer museum redesign

A redesign of a site based on findings from a heuristic evaluation, ultimately presented through a developed responsive site. This project had a heavy emphasis on solving established usability issues. The final site was developed using HTML and Sass within 11ty.

  • summer 2021
  • HTML
  • SASS
  • 11ty

← →

canvas redesign

A redesign of Instructure's Canvas that aims to create a learning management system focused on overall clarity and organization, as well as intuitive use for both students and instructors. The process involved interviewing students, card sorting, and site map testing.

  • summer 2021
  • HTML
  • SASS
  • 11ty

visual library

A compilation of visual inspirations ranging from paintings and sculptures to typographic design. The final site was created using HTML and Sass within 11ty and utilizes JSON data in order to organize and display each card.

  • spring 2021
  • HTML
  • SASS
  • 11ty
  • JSON
